short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inverted display mode for less eye strain in dark or dim lighting

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a free add-on for Chrome Browser where the primary target is toggling day and night mode on web pages easily and quickly. Also, set a background from our selective Abstract images gallery powered by Unsplash in your Chrome Browser default New tab. We are actually changing your Chrome browser default new tab page. There is also a Digital Clock in new tabs where you can check your current location time in 12 hours/ 24-hour format according to your preference. Also as added features, In Night Mode, the entire page will be fading to dark and all text colors will be adjusted to the dark color as well. In Day Mode, the page and all text colors will be switched to normal. Search your desired information, image, video and others through Bing search. Note: In order to white-list a website from Night Mode, right click on the webpage and click "Add site to whitelist".
By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to install "Sundown Extension" Chrome extension and setting Chromeâ„¢  New Tab to that provided by the service with web search by Bing, and the Privacy Policy (https://vobis.tv/privacy-policy/) and Terms of Use (https://vobis.tv/terms-conditions/).
